definitions: (of a wall, building, or room) painted with whitewash

examples.text: the town is a pretty jumble of low whitewashed houses tumbling down to a golden beach
dark wood furniture and beamed ceilings offset the whitewashed walls

definitions: concealing unpleasant facts about someone or something

examples.text: organizations that admit to failures are probably more trustworthy than those which present whitewashed accounts of their achievements
a whitewashed version of the past
